a: Brook Livin aims to discover the potentials of a safer lifestyle. Based on more than 20 years of R&D experiences, Brook Livin aspires to invent products for daily life with the latest technology and strive for continuous innovation like a chameleon, satisfying desires for lifestyles with better quality.

q: Where are Brook Livin’s Products Designed and Developed?
a: All of Brook Livin’s products are designed and developed in Taiwan.
